question: You would like to participate in a work-related seminar in another country.Write a letter to the person in charge of the seminar and ask for detailed information regarding the dates, program, accommodation and cost.
text: I am writing this letter to express my interest in the seminar as I would like to anticipate which is related to our job which is supposed to be happening in Australia.

Firstly, it would be great if you could provide me with the details such as the accurate dates so that I will look after direct flight options whether is it available or not else I would choose to haul flights according to the planned dates.
Also, I would appreciate it if you could pass on some information related to the function as where the venue is along with that particular timings and days.

Lastly, I would like to enquire about the accommodation that what sort of accommodation, I mean it would be a separate room or I have to share it with someone from the staff. Please share the brochure if possible with the room prices.
I hope to hear from you soon.
